title: Drawing, "Design for a Vanity and Rectangular Mirror", 1933–35
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper margin, right: BED A6; lower left: K. / 9/30/33; lower right: out; dimensions throughout; lower left: 4 [circled]; in red color pencil, lower right: P
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for long rectangular vanity and mirror. Vanity open below on left side; two drawers at right side with rectangular pulls. Drawers in lighter material than surface and legs of table. Mirror above vanity on left side with various framing panels of wood/metal (?).

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Vanity and Rectangular Mirror", 1933–35.
1933–35. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1293.
